snippet: François Hollande is seen as pleasant, uncharismatic and unauthoritative by many who supported him for president a year ago. Opinion polls say only a quarter of the French view him favorably.
abstract: French Pres Francois Hollande has had to deal with divisions in his own Socialist Party, ailing economy and strains with Germany in year since taking office; is seen as uncharismatic and unauthoritative by most French people and only one quarter view him favorably.
lead_paragraph: François Hollande is seen as pleasant, uncharismatic and unauthoritative by many who supported him for president a year ago. Opinion polls say only a quarter of the French view him favorably.

headline.seo: Year Into Hollande Presidency, ‘a Sense of Drift’
headline.main: One Year Into Hollande Presidency in France, ‘a Sense of Drift’
headline.print_headline: One Year Into Hollande Presidency in France, ‘a Sense of Drift’
